item.description:
I have said before and I will say it until the day I die. "Everybody has the ability to do Reiki and everyone should be trained in it." We all have the senses to use it and to help our loved ones, our animals, our plants,  and even cars and other inanimate objects are effected by energywork!!

 

I love to study metaphysics and use the information to advance the work we do here! Come join our wonderful evening as Karen Cerato explains Reiki in the purest form. She will share with you the healing effects, the calming effects and the way your body craves homeostasis. Reiki can bring you to the that level. All you need is a open mind and a a lcear intention~.

 

Join the one hour free program to learn how to share using the power of Reiki today!

 

For those of you that decide to decide you wan to learn more please join our class on Sunday, April 1st for Reiki I with Karen Cerato, Reiki Master Teacher.

More detail to follow!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Reiki Information night- Karen Cerato, Reiki Master Teacher
